mapper.select: select CASE WHEN count(1) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END from t_flink_app where flink_cluster_id = #{clusterId} and state = 5 limit 1

select count(1) from t_flink_app where flink_cluster_id = #{clusterId} and state in (5, 7, 9)
and (end_time IS NULL or EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - end_time)) <= 2)
and (end_time IS NULL or TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, end_time, NOW()) <= 2)
limit 1
select t.*, p.name as projectName from t_flink_app t left join t_flink_project p on t.project_id = p.id where t.id = #{id}

mapper.select: select k8s_pod_template from ( select k8s_pod_template, max(create_time) as ct from t_flink_app where k8s_pod_template is not null and k8s_pod_template !='' and execution_mode = 6 group by k8s_pod_template order by ct desc ) as pt limit #{limitSize}
